sentences.sContent: Many causes have been proposed for both the intelligence gap and the Flynn effect, including education, income, and even nonagricultural labor.
sentences.sContent_eng: Many causes have been proposed for both the intelligence gap and the Flynn effect, including education, income, and even nonagricultural labor.
sentences.sCn: 人们对智力差距和弗林效应提出了许多成因，包括教育、收入，甚至还包括非农业劳动。

sentences.sContent: There has been "good" progress in persuading locals, mostly people engaged in nonagricultural activities, to give up land, she says.
sentences.sContent_eng: There has been "good" progress in persuading locals, mostly people engaged in nonagricultural activities, to give up land, she says.
sentences.sCn: 她指出，针对当地居民的说服工作已经取得喜人的进展，大部分未从事农业活动的居民表示愿意放弃土地。

trans.tranOther: not of or relating to agriculture
